segments.text: I see an Open House sign over there , and I think we should go check it out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that looks like a very nice house . Is it on our Internet listing for Open Houses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I see it listed on the printout we got off of the Internet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love the beautiful lawn . What a great front entryway !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need to make sure to put our names in the registry so the realtor knows we were here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That works for me . We can check out the kitchen next .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: On such a hot day , it is thoughtful to have water out for potential buyers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Check out the flyer with all of the home â€™ s information on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the price of this house in the flyer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They have changed the asking price since it first went on the market . It is now two hundred and twenty-five thousand .
segments.speaker: S2
